trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [black cards total v] to [0] set [index v] to [1] ask [Please enter a sequence of black and white squares (B for black and W for white):] and wait set [cards v] to (answer) repeat (length of (cards)) if <(letter (index) of (cards)) = [B]> then change [black cards total v] by (1) end change [index v] by (1) end say (black cards total)
